full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**
**Solicitation No.: 2BH4170371/A**
**Department: Global Affairs Canada**
**Notification Period: 14 days (July 18, 2024, to July 31, 2024)**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Category:** GD (Government department)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding (OPen Tendering)

**Request for Quantity**: The Department of Global Affairs Canada requires a quantity of 10 x Apple 16-inch MacBook Pro with M3 Max chip and AppleCare+ warranty and storage media retention or equivalent. The devices shall be delivered to Ottawa, ON, within 30 federal government working days from the contract award date.

**Security Requirements:** None applicable.
**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA):** None applicable.

**Procurement Procedure:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
* Bids must be submitted through the Public-Private Partnership (P2P) portal for RFQ Submission by the date, time, and place indicated on page 1 of the RFQ.
* To access the solicitation and submit your bid, please click on the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

**Important Information:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to:
Emily Meas, Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
99 Metcalfe Street, 11th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1E3
Telephone: 343-548-4195
Email: emily.meas@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Attachments:** The listing of attachments is included below.

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/6DF0C92E-E401-4232-A3DB-FF1BE55E023F
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2B1967D5-7008-40D
